If [[Orochimaru]] is bisected by an opponent, [[snake]]s are able to emerge from both halves of his body and pull him back together, seemingly undoing the damage he sustained.

== Trivia ==
* In the manga, the snakes used for this technique resemble those that emerge from Orochimaru's body in his [[Orochimaru#Body Modifications|true form]], whereas in the anime, they appear to be regular [[Summoning Technique|summoned]] snakes.
